<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns parent display of the given display.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  '''displayParent''' display

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Display]]
